problem_names:
lemma pmf_of_set_lottery:
  "A \<noteq> {} \<Longrightarrow> finite A \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> pmf_of_set A \<in> lotteries_on B"

lemma pmf_of_list_lottery: 
  "pmf_of_list_wf xs \<Longrightarrow> set (map fst xs) \<subseteq> A \<Longrightarrow> pmf_of_list xs \<in> lotteries_on A"

lemma return_pmf_in_lotteries_on [simp,intro]: 
  "x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> return_pmf x \<in> lotteries_on A"
translations:
lemma pmf_of_set_lottery:
  "A \<noteq> {} \<Longrightarrow> finite A \<Longrightarrow> A \<subseteq> B \<Longrightarrow> pmf_of_set A \<in> lotteries_on B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>A \<noteq> {}; finite A; A \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> pmf_of_set A \<in> lotteries_on B

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>A \<noteq> {}; finite A; A \<subseteq> B\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> pmf_of_set A \<in> {p. set_pmf p \<subseteq> B}

lemma pmf_of_list_lottery: 
  "pmf_of_list_wf xs \<Longrightarrow> set (map fst xs) \<subseteq> A \<Longrightarrow> pmf_of_list xs \<in> lotteries_on A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>pmf_of_list_wf xs; set (map fst xs) \<subseteq> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> pmf_of_list xs \<in> lotteries_on A

proof (prove)
using this:
  pmf_of_list_wf xs \<Longrightarrow>
  set_pmf (pmf_of_list xs) \<subseteq> set (map fst xs)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>pmf_of_list_wf xs; set (map fst xs) \<subseteq> A\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> pmf_of_list xs \<in> lotteries_on A

lemma return_pmf_in_lotteries_on [simp,intro]: 
  "x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> return_pmf x \<in> lotteries_on A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> return_pmf x \<in> lotteries_on A
